content: WELCOME! I am a fifth-year Ph.D. candidate in Economics at the European University Institute (EUI) in Florence, Italy. My research focuses on economic growth, innovation, and firm dynamics. Specifically, I examine how the direction of technological change is shaped by labor market conditions, previous innovations, and the characteristics of different technology fields.
